english.segment1: Rid me of the notion that I ever had any rights. Cleanse me of the motives that come in such a clever disguise. Ruin my agenda, holy as it never was
english.segment2: It's all from Your hand. and there's nothing that's mine. and all that You give. You're free to take away
english.segment3: I'm just trying to hold on, clinging to the dream inside. I was only selfish, and you were only part of my life
english.segment4: Every breath, every word. There isn't one thing I deserve. And all that I am is Yours
